attributes.action: Guarantee the defence and protection of  the Falkland Islands Overseas Territiory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Falkland Islands are British Territory and have been since 1833. We need a guarantee from our Government that the Falkland Islands shall remain so and will be defended against any aggression, whether it be military or political, from Argentina or any other party. The lives of those British citizens lost in the liberation of the Falkland Islands and their inhabitants shall not be in vain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
